summary: Locate deep underground entrance to ancient dwemer complex.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/5702/018481.png[/img][/center]
[i]Find out what else Blackreach hides. Discover abandoned dwarven ruins and learn about its secrets. But be careful. You are not alone, among rusty devices and stones restless souls are waiting for you.[/i]

I made dwemer complex consists of 8 locations. Find entrance in Blackreach and go through all ruined city. This mod add new elements such as dwemer coins, schemes. But I will not reveal more and not spoil surprises, download, see for yourself and endorse if you like it. This mod is lore-friendly.

[u]~~Requirements:~~[/u]
actually nothing

[u]~~Installation:~~[/u]
put folder in X:.../steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data

[center][img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/5702/018481.png[/img][/center]
author: Vartisharan
